column4: Any1?? My laptop screen is totally black after linux have booted up, I can only use linux if I have an external screen connected. Any1 know what's wrong?
what kind of laptop is it ?
that machine has an ati graphics card ?
you might want to install the binary drivers for your ati card.
: Im a bit noob, so, how do I do that?
does your screen work if the second monitor is not plugged in ?
are you on the linux machine right now, or another one ?
: I have a server machine with windows XP also...
ok well can you post your /etc/X11/xorg.conf file to pastebin.ca ?
I am off for a quick cig brb
you can just install the binary driver for ati cards for your kernel in the restricted repo.
: Im all new to this, how do I do that?
1 sec will get you a link
I have to split for an hour or so search the wiki or maybe someone can get you a link using uboto here in the channel. BYE
